mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.content, c.created_at, CASE WHEN c.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN u.name WHEN c.admin_id IS NOT NULL THEN a.name END AS writer FROM comment c LEFT JOIN admin a ON c.admin_id = a.account_id LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.account_id WHERE board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY comment_id DESC
